content.query:
--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_DimStockItem
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO wwi.DimStockItem
--(StockItemKey 1, WWIStockItemID 2, Stock Item 3, Color 4, SellingPackage 5, Buying Package 6, Brand 7, Size 8, LeadTimeDays 9, QuantityPerOuter 10, IsChillerStock 11, Barcode 12, TaxRate 13, UnitPrice 14, RecommendedRetailPrice 15, TypicalWeightPerUnit 16, ValidFrom 17, ValidTo 18, LineageKey 19)
FROM 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/WWI/wwi-dimstockitem.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = '|'
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM wwi.DimStockItem
GO

--alter table wwi.DimStockItem
--alter column IsChillerStock nvarchar(5) not null
